ModMetaData.name: Prioritize (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: InsertKey
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of InsertKeys mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1579272031
- Removed the HugsLib dependency from 1.5
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr][td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/Prioritize][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/h5VwTNL.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]Prioritize many things![/h1]
This mod allows you to set priority in many things. (Adds priority designator on architect tab)
Including - Blueprints - Designations (Mining, plant cutting, etc) - Plants area - etc..
[b]You can priortize each kind of job only (Example : Floor smoothing and constructing is different, so will not do floor smoothing(even has priority) if construction is not finished)[/b]
[h1]Thing priority and Cell priority[/h1] [b]Thing priority can prioritize things, including buildings, designated things, pawns, etc[/b] [b]Cell priority can priotitize plants area, things at that location, etc[/b]
[b]What is unsafe patches in mods config?[/b] Unsafe patches allows more things affected by prioritizing. Including bills ingredients, etc.
But can cause some issues.
[h1]Controls[/h1] [b]Using priority designator, Use Ctrl+Mouse Wheel to increase/decrease priority.[/b] You can set priority between -32766(low priority)~32768(high priority).
Right click priority designator to set priority, selection options. You can see priority even not using designator using Right Bottom priority icon settings.
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] [b]This mod requires HugsLib[/b] Should not break existing saves. Should conflict with anything modifies construct job. (I can fix it later) Should compatible with various mods, and you probably can priortize them!
[h1]Known incompatible mods at this time[/h1] [strike]QualityBuilder[/strike] (If you want to set priority in Q.B, use Cell Priority)
Non steam download https://github.com/kpqi5858/Prioritize/releases/tag/v1.1 (Or source code in github repo)
[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/qWJBwra.gif[/IMG]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
